headline.main: Duke's Allen Receives T for Elbowing UNC's Robinson in Face
headline.print_headline: Duke's Allen Receives T for Elbowing UNC's Robinson in Face

lead_paragraph: Duke guard Grayson Allen has received a technical foul for elbowing North Carolina guard Brandon Robinson in the face late in the first half of Saturday night's rivalry game.
snippet: Duke guard Grayson Allen has received a technical foul for elbowing North Carolina guard Brandon Robinson in the face late in the first half of Saturday night's rivalry game....
